member.name: M:Solid.Arduino.StringExtensions.ToBinaryCodedDecimal(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts the argument string into its binary-coded decimal (BCD) representation, e.g. "1234" -> { 0x12, 0x34 } (for Big Endian byte order) "1234" -> { 0x43, 0x21 } (for Little Endian byte order)
member.param: True if the byte order is "little end first (leftmost)".
member.returns: Byte array representation of the string as BCD.
member.exception: Thrown if the argument string isn't entirely made up of BCD pairs.
